findings.title: Owner cannot set fees over 10%
findings.description: The owner of the contract cannot set tax or redis fees above 10%.

findings.title: A02.Owner cannot pause transfer
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to pause transfers.

findings.title: A03.Owner cannot blacklist
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to blacklist certain addresses or functionality.

findings.title: A04.Owner cannot take back ownership
findings.description: The contract owner cannot reassign ownership after renouncing it.

findings.title: A05.Owner cannot limit the number of wallet holdings
findings.description: The owner has no ability to restrict the number of wallet holdings.

findings.title: A06.Owner cannot set the selling time interval
findings.description: The contract owner has no ability to configure or modify the selling time interval.

findings.title: Renouncing Ownership Leaves Contract Without Owner
findings.description: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner
